objects.name: Bed
objects.message: A comfortable bed. Time to get up — today is the first day of the job.

objects.name: Laptop
objects.message: My laptop. I use it to prepare lessons for my students.

objects.name: Fridge
objects.message: The fridge. Mom keeps it well stocked.

objects.name: TV
objects.message: The TV is off. No time for anime today.

objects.name: Kotatsu
objects.message: The kotatsu. Warm and cozy — dangerous when you have somewhere to be.

conversation.speaker: mom
conversation.text:
おはよう、りきぞう！
(Good morning, Rikizo!)

conversation.speaker: りきぞう
conversation.text:
おはよう、お母さん。
(Good morning, Mom.)

conversation.speaker: mom
conversation.text:
あなたはとてもいい先生ですよ。
(You are a very good teacher, you know.)

conversation.speaker: りきぞう
conversation.text:
そうですか？うれしいです！
(Really? That makes me happy!)

conversation.speaker: mom
conversation.text:
お母さんがいちばんうれしいですよ。
(Mom is the happiest of all.)

conversation.speaker: dad
conversation.text:
よ、りきぞう！先生ですか？
(Hey, Rikizo! Are you a teacher?)

conversation.speaker: りきぞう
conversation.text:
はい！わたしは先生です。
(Yes! I am a teacher.)

conversation.speaker: dad
conversation.text:
やさしい先生ですか？
(Are you a kind teacher?)

conversation.speaker: りきぞう
conversation.text:
はい、とてもやさしい先生です！
(Yes, a very kind teacher!)

conversation.speaker: dad
conversation.text:
そうか。りきぞうはいちばんいい先生です。
(Is that so. Rikizo is the best teacher.)
